page.title: 03CLYRO POST OFFICE AND SHOP
page.content: The shop provides a natural point for the communication of{local events. Local activities are advertised in the shop window, including notices of { {shows, whist drives, fetes and {meetings.}As a result it often proves to be an informal meeting place where local activities are discussed. The changes in the format of the shop have been generally welcomed by the community. There is now much more space, goods are clearly displayed and service is generally quicker. A few of the older villagers have felt that some of the personal contact and the opportunity for conversation have been sacrficed in implementing greater efficiency. Outside the Post Office is the village's only {Post Box and Public {Telephone Kiosk.}
